title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The bug report is missing a description of the issue. Please provide a clear and detailed description of the problem you are experiencing.
SR:
Add the following line toStyledTextperformPaint method to see the redraws occurring:
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
